body: Alright, so I was waiting for a match of Crusade to begin, and just before it began, I was kicked out of it. I tried to access it, but got a message saying that I was banned by an operator. I thought,. "NOOOOOO" Checked my infractions page, no ban. I tried to access Avicus, and I could get on fine. Tried to get back on MCZone02, but got kicked by the same message. Tried to go to MCZone03 as a test, and it worked. What the hell is going on?

replies.body: Check to see if it is only you encountering the problem or if its the same for everyone. If the server is bugged then I am sure it will be fixed soon enough. If it is just your problem then i suggest contacting a senior staff member or emailing support@avicus.net . Good luck, it sounds like a strange problem. :3

replies.body:
Seems like a java issue..
try deleting system 32 and then smashing your computer with a hammer..
works every time.
Oh and by the way, make sure to use a Hammer from Bunnings

However, I can assure you that this is a glitch, and I've been contacted multiple times that many people have the same problem; but on Nexus07.
